extendedInfo.description: Eon Phone ProÂ© - Mobile VoIP Sign Up for Mobile VoIP now:  http://www.eonphone.com/?product_cat=androidDESCRIPTIONComplete-feature Mobile VoIP - Video Calling - Text - SMSUnlimited calls US and Canada for a flat rate! Reduce cost of calling on carrier phone minutes or eliminate carrierCOMMUNICATEHear the Difference! Eon Phone Pro Mobile VoIP lets you choose and add multiple phone numbers to your mobile devices and turn them into a communication center. Eon Phone Pro is an affordable Mobile VoIP subscription service saving hundreds of dollars off your cellular bill - it does not rely on a cellular connection for inbound and outbound communication.Call it Mobile VoIP, smartphone, iPad  and tablet. Use Wi-Fi, 3G, 4G, 4GLTE. Make free calls on this SIP Mobile service. All telecommunications is moving to Mobile devices, video and text make the communication center for your life-style. Eon Phone brings you Mobile and tablet communications with video and text and all the coming tools you will want. International calling is simple with international languages. Today, smartphone users need flexibility - calls, video, text-SMS, conference calls, transfers, Wi-Fi, 3G, 4G, 4GLTE and your HotSpot! Bluetooth supported.Multi-line mobile VoIP with the highest quality calling. PRICINGMany Packages - Monthly - Quarterly - Half Year - Full YearFEATURESVideo CallingText - SMS Wi-Fi, 3G, 4G, 4GLTE or a mobile cellular network option including home and HotSpots. In-call quality indicator, Background Noise Suppression and Echo SuppressionPush Notifications, a reliable way to receive calls when Eon Phone Pro Softphone is closedMulti line â have multiple accounts to receive incoming calls and switch the account used for outgoing calls without leaving the keypadFastDial, your 12 favorite contacts are one touch awayDetailed call history, with intelligent call grouping for an easy overview New: history searchCall Forwarding, Call conferencing Call waitingBluetooth for supported mobile devices (iPhones, iOS 3.1 and higher, iPad 2 and iPod Touch 4th Generation only)Complete contact management        Contacts search function        iPhone contacts integration, easy to call anyone in your contact list        Add new contacts directly from Eon Phone        Number rewriting, enabling you to use your existing contacts without having to create new entries         Address Book Matching to automatically format your incoming numbers to match your existing contactsSpeakerphone Voicemail waiting indicatorGoogle Voice integrationCustomizable ringtones, choose from our selection or pick something from an external libraryCall recorder and player, seamlessly integrated into the call historyMulti-language (currently English, Spanish, Chinese, Danish, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Swedish, French, German, Italian, Russian, Czech and Slovak)Built in country codes, enter + on the keypad, then tap on the globe and select the country you want to dial (as supported)Transfer and attended transferLIVE CUSTOMER SUPPORTUnlike large Mobile VoIP providers, Eon Phone provides live customer service during business hours (8 â 5 CST). We have many FAQâs.  You can contact through the Service link on the bottom of the site pages, and enter a ticket; or send an email to help@eonphone.com.NOTE:Most customer problems regarding service outage are due to customersâ local Wi-Fi connection and/or cellular data provider for 3G and 4G service. If you want Live Chat support, please visit us at support.eonphone.com. Please contact us at help@eonphone.com to troubleshoot before leaving a critical review.Powered By Discover Calling, Inc.Â©Keywords  Mobile VoIP Wi-Fi smartphone, free calling, second line softphone, SIP, Wi-Fi, 3G, 4G, 4GLTE, Eon, Eon Phone, Eon Phone Lite, Eon Phone Pro, EonPhone, 2nd line, telecommunications, communications, cellular network, text, sms, video
